thread.title: Shabby chic, but delightful
thread.title_full: Shabby chic, but delightful - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DMarshall2014
title: Shabby chic, but delightful
text:
We recently had a family reunion n NYC and the Roger Smith Hotel was a perfect place to gather and be comfy. Not deluxe, but serves the purpose...clean, great location and a nice staff. Books in the room to read and exchange, frig, coffee makers too. Starbucks right next door.
Green Features: Coffee makers in room, apples and yogurt at front desk....
